instance_template.service_account_id: The ID of the service account authorized for this instance

test-api-gateway.name: some_name
test-api-gateway.spec:
openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Test API
paths:
  /hello:
    get:
      summary: Say hello
      operationId: hello
      parameters:
        - name: user
          in: query
          description: User name to appear in greetings
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: 'world'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Greeting
          content:
            'text/plain':
              schema:
                type: "string"
      x-yc-apigateway-integration:
        type: dummy
        http_code: 200
        http_headers:
          'Content-Type': "text/plain"
        content:
          'text/plain': "Hello again, {user}!\n"

self_managed.private_key: -----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY----- // ... -----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----

dataproc.name: dataproc
dataproc.description: service account to manage Dataproc Cluster

sa-static-key.description: static access key for object storage

shard_group.name: single_shard_group
shard_group.description: Cluster configuration that contain only shard1

ingress.description: Allow incoming traffic from members of the same security group

egress.description: Allow outgoing traffic to members of the same security group

foo.name: test_ha
foo.description: test High-Availability (HA) PostgreSQL Cluster with priority and set master

ingress.description: Allow incoming traffic from members of the same security group

egress.description: Allow outgoing traffic to members of the same security group

sa-static-key.description: static access key for object storage
